title: Incorrect Influence Points in Client
body: This is the 2nd time this has happened to my account.  I have 1717 IP and the store says I do not have enough IP to buy a 1700 IP mystery champion shard.  A rioter had to tweak my account last time to fix this.  I already re-logged.  Please correct my IP value so I can purchase in the store based on the 1717 IP amount the client shows I have.  Thanks

replies.body:
Are you on the updated client?  Your balance is likely out of sync but returning to the legacy should fix it up:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher" 

Let me know if that helps!
